title: Frequently Asked Questions
content:
The initial width of the parent element is unknown

When drawing a chart in a container whose initial width is unknown, the chart fails to be drawn because the width cannot be obtained. The solution is to obtain the width after the container width is known. Invoke the resize method of echarts. cancel-resize-check is used to check whether a component element exists and whether the element has width and height before resize. If no, the component element does not have width and height.
